meanings.sent1: The baby urped all over the high chair.
meanings.sent2: After eating too much candy, he urped in the bathroom.
meanings.sent3: The dog urped up his dinner right on the carpet.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing garbage can urped out a foul smell.
meanings.sent5: The motion sickness urped sensation was unbearable.

meanings.definition: Past tense of 'urp', meaning to burp or belch.
meanings.sent1: She urped loudly after drinking a fizzy soda.
meanings.sent2: He urped after chugging a can of soda.
meanings.sent3: The old man urped unexpectedly during the quiet meeting.
meanings.sent4: The car engine urped and sputtered before finally starting.
meanings.sent5: The volcano urped out a cloud of ash and smoke.
